013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.List;
018    import java.util.Locale;
019    import java.util.Map;
020    
021    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
022    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
023    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
024    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ArrayUtils;
025    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.StringUtils;
026    
027    /**
028     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
029     */
030    public class MemberOfCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<MemberOf>
031    {
032            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
033    
034            private boolean ignoreCase;
035            private List<String> members;
036            private transient List<String> membersLowerCase;
037    
038            /**
039             * {@inheritDoc}
040             */
041            @Override
042            public void configure(final MemberOf constraintAnnotation)
043            {
044                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
045                    setIgnoreCase(constraintAnnotation.ignoreCase());
046                    setMembers(constraintAnnotation.value());
047            }
048    
049            /**
050             * {@inheritDoc}
051             */
052            @Override
053            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
054            {
055                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
056                    messageVariables.put("ignoreCase", Boolean.toString(ignoreCase));
057                    messageVariables.put("members", StringUtils.implode(members, ","));
058                    return messageVariables;
059            }
060    
061            /**
062             * @return the members
063             */
064            public List<String> getMembers()
065            {
066                    final List<String> v = getCollectionFactory().createList();
067                    v.addAll(members);
068                    return v;
069            }
070    
071            private List<String> getMembersLowerCase()
072            {
073                    if (membersLowerCase == null)
074                    {
075                            membersLowerCase = getCollectionFactory().createList(members.size());
076                            for (final String val : members)
077                            {
078                                    membersLowerCase.add(val.toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault()));
079                            }
080                    }
081                    return membersLowerCase;
082            }
083    
084            /**
085             * @return the ignoreCase
086             */
087            public boolean isIgnoreCase()
088            {
089                    return ignoreCase;
090            }
091    
092            /**
093             * {@inheritDoc}
094             */
095            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
096                            final Validator validator)
097            {
098                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
099    
100                    if (ignoreCase)
101                            return getMembersLowerCase().contains(valueToValidate.toString().toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault()));
102    
103                    return members.contains(valueToValidate.toString());
104            }
105    
106            /**
107             * @param ignoreCase the ignoreCase to set
108             */
109            public void setIgnoreCase(final boolean ignoreCase)
110            {
111                    this.ignoreCase = ignoreCase;
112                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
113            }
114    
115            /**
116             * @param members the members to set
117             */
118            public void setMembers(final List<String> members)
119            {
120                    this.members = getCollectionFactory().createList();
121                    this.members.addAll(members);
122                    membersLowerCase = null;
123                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
124            }
125    
126            /**
127             * @param members the members to set
128             */
129            public void setMembers(final String... members)
130            {
131                    this.members = getCollectionFactory().createList();
132                    ArrayUtils.addAll(this.members, members);
133                    membersLowerCase = null;
134                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
135            }
136    }
